featured.text: In the 19th century, the emperors began to establish a state monopoly, largely due to the rise of illegal production of low-quality vodka.

During the Age of Exploration, commerce in Zanzibar quickly boomed, largely due to the rise of the spice trade.
According to a recent study, the part of your brain that reacts to severe pain is largely the same part that reacts to expectation of pain.
